title: Sid Verma Discusses Bond Investors (Audio)
itunes:title: Sid Verma Discusses Bond Investors (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. (Carol Solo) \u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Sid Verma\u0010Reporter:Markets\u0010Bloomberg Editorial\u0010Will discuss his story about bond investors being smarter than stock pickers.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
